channel.title: R on Alan Yeung
channel.description: Recent content in R on Alan Yeung

item.title: R Training Resources and Tips
item.description: A short list of resources and tips to help with learning some R basics, with particular focus on the tidyverse.

item.title: phiproject
item.description: An RStudio project template incorporating some best practices.

item.title: objectremover RStudio Addin
item.description: An RStudio addin to assist with removing objects from the global environment. Features include removing objects according to name patterns and object type.
